Translations.Text: Say: "He is God who is Uniquely Singular
Who is Eternal, [the uncaused cause of all that exists]
Who has not given birth nor is He born
and there is no equivalent to Him
Say: "I seek refuge with the lord of the Daybreak
from the evil in that which He has created
and from the evil of the darkness when it settles
and from women who blow on knots
and from the evil of the envious when he envies
Say: "I seek refuge with the Lord of people
From the evil of the insidious whisperer
who whispers [evil] into the hearts of people
from among the jinn or people
